publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1268 Karen Whitefield: Airdrie United Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates the players, management, staff and supporters at Airdrie United on gaining promotion to the First Division only two years after the inception of the club and welcomes the club's commitment to working in partnership with the community by including a representative from the Supporters' Trust on the Board of Directors.
S2M-1268 Airdrie United Football Club (lodged on 5 May 2004) Colin Fox*, Cathie Craigie*, Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*, Bill Butler*, Trish Godman*, Pauline McNeill*

S2M-1268 Karen Whitefield: Airdrie United Football Club-That the Parliament congratulates the players, management, staff and supporters at Airdrie United on gaining promotion to the First Division only two years after the inception of the club and welcomes the club's commitment to working in partnership with the community by including a representative from the Supporters' Trust on the Board of Directors. Supported by: Colin Fox, Cathie Craigie, Linda Fabiani, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Bill Butler, Trish Godman, Pauline McNeill, Scott Barrie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Michael McMahon*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-1268 Airdrie United Football Club (lodged on 5 May 2004) Brian Adam*
S2M-1268 Airdrie United Football Club (lodged on 5 May 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1268 Airdrie United Football Club (lodged on 5 May 2004) Richard Baker*, Mike Watson*
